item.title: pullquote - blockquote
item.content:encoded:
With a p tag, I was enveloped in thick forest; by late afternoon, I had logged two bear sightings.

Without a p tag, I was enveloped in thick forest; by late afternoon, I had logged two bear sightings.

text in section - By lunchtime, I was enveloped in thick forest; by late afternoon, I had logged two bear sightings.
